await.description: A boolean for top-level await in modules without ESM exports. (Node 10+)

cache.description: [dev] A boolean for toggling cache creation or a cache directory path

cjs.description: A boolean or object for toggling CJS features in ESM

cache.description: A boolean for storing ES modules in require.cache

dedefault.description: A boolean for requiring ES modules without the dangling require().default

extensions.description: A boolean for respecting require.extensions in ESM

mutableNamespace.description: A boolean for importing named exports of CJS modules

namedExports.description: A boolean for importing named exports of CJS modules

paths.description: A boolean for following CJS path rules in ESM

topLevelReturn.description: A boolean for top-level return support

vars.description: A boolean for __dirname, __filename, and require in ESM

force.description: A boolean to apply these options to all module loads

mainFields.description: An array of fields checked when importing a package

mode.description: A string describing the mode in which to detect ESM module files

oneOf.description: 'auto' detect files with import, import.meta, export, 'use module', or .mjs as ESM
'all' files besides those with 'use script' or .cjs are treated as ESM
'strict to treat only .mjs files as ESM

sourceMap.description: [dev] A boolean for including inline source maps

wasm.description: A boolean for WebAssembly module support. (Node 8+)

title: Configuration files for the esm module/package in Node.js
